title: How did immigrants adapt to life in the US? - Quora
tags: Living in the United States of America
Immigration to the United States of America

response.answer_text: Your intention is to harass others- not to get info. i met two women: One in road near Mosque in Redmond. She was not good in English. I offered her a dollar- she was happy. Another girl: Just 25 , with 2 small children. Definitely a refugee. I saw her in front of departmental stores. I saw few persons living in tent - in front of same Departmental stores. I was told they are refugees. I saw another male on road: with a board: Homeless, please help.
